articles.title: Cricket recommended for 2028 LA Olympics spot
articles.description: Cricket could be in the Olympics for the first time since 1900 as organisers recommend it to be part of the 2028 Los Angeles Games.
articles.content:
England won the 2022 Men's Twenty20 World Cup
Cricket could be in the Olympics for the first time since 1900 after organisers recommended it to be part of the 2028 Los Angeles Games.

articles.title: New Zealand comfortably beat Netherlands in World Cup
articles.description: New Zealand continue their unbeaten start to the Men's Cricket World Cup with a dominant 99-run win over the Netherlands in Hyderabad.
articles.content:
ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023, Hyderabad
New Zealand 322-7 (50 overs): Young 70 (80), Latham 53 (46); Van der Merwe 2-56

articles.title: Boult takes 'absolutely spectacular catch' for New Zealand

articles.content:

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
